name: International Conference on Intelligent Manufacturing and Industrial Automation
content: International Conference on Intelligent Manufacturing and Industrial Automation (CIMIA 2021) will be held in Guilin, China during 26th-28th March 2021\. CIMIA 2021 is an international forum for scientists, engineers, and practitioners to present their latest research and development results in all areas of Intelligent Manufacturing and Industrial Automation. Conference topics mainly include but are not limited to 3D printing, Additive Manufacturing, Artificial Intelligence Application, Automation Equipment etc. CIMIA 2021 welcomes all high-quality research papers and presentations from related research fields. Call for Keynote speakers and Committee members The CIMIA 2021 is calling for Keynote Speakers and Committee Members. For keynote speakers, speech topics are required to be relevant to the conference topics. If you have any intention to be a keynote speaker or a committee member for the CIMIA 2021, please send your CV to contactcimia@163.com. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
